pullRequest.title: [#1632] Close command consumer on closed device link
pullRequest.bodyText:
This is for #1632 (and relates to #1732):
A timeout, while waiting for a delivery update for a command sent to a device, now not only leads to the command AMQP link with the device to be detached but also causes the command consumer to be closed.

beforeCommit.message:
[#1632] Close command consumer on closed device link.

Signed-off-by: Carsten Lohmann <carsten.lohmann@bosch.io>

nodes.bodyText: given that we already handle the disposition updates via the CommandContext, I wonder if it wouldn't be more consistent (and elegant) to provide a closeConsumer() method in CommandContext instead of passing in the MessageConsumer as an extra argument. WDYT?
